title: Samosas
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '30g butter', '4 tablespoons water', '1L oil for deep frying', '30g butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 green chillies, chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh root ginger, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '350g minced lamb', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 1/2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice']
